text: Luis Arriaga (born January 26, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays for Real Salt Lake as a midfielder. ==Professional career== Arriaga signed with Real Salt Lake on November 28, 2018, ahead of the 2019 season.https://www.rsl.com/post/2018/11/28/real-salt-lake-signs-rsl-academy- duo-homegrown-contracts ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American soccer players Category:American sportspeople of Mexican descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Homegrown Players (MLS) Category:Major League Soccer players Category:Real Salt Lake players Category:Real Monarchs players Category:Soccer players from California Category:Sportspeople from Santa Rosa, California Category:USL Championship players
title: Luis Arriaga
